FuncDef: This command specifies dot1p in-profile mappings. The inplus-profile traffic is marked with the same value as in-profile traffic.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the unique IEEE 802.1p value that will match the dot1p rule. If the command is executed multiple times with the same dot1p-value, the previous forwarding class and enqueuing priority is completely overridden by the new parameters or defined to be inherited when a forwarding class or enqueuing priority parameter is missing. Values-0 to 7.
